department.ch: 網路學習科技研究所碩士班
department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology

goal.ch: 此課程主要以設計思考為基礎，輔以創新問題解決策略，帶領學生以理論為基礎，融合跨領域之系統概念、內容與方法，設計與發展各種教材教法、建構互動式教學環境，並討論創新科技應用與導入的機制。內容包括：系統科學、設計思考、創新策略、跨域教學設計、隱喻思考與創作、科技創新、研究與觀點等等。
goal.en: The course will guide students to use design thinking and innovative problem-solving skills, integrate interdisciplinary systematic concepts, content, and methods, to design teaching strategies, develop learning materials, construct an interactive learning environment, and discuss innovative technology use and applications and related mechanisms. Content may include Systems Science, Design Thinking, Innovation Strategies, Interdisciplinary Instructional Design, Metaphoric Thinking and Creations, Technology Innovation, Research and Perspectives, etc.

outline.ch: 內容包括：系統科學、設計思考、創新策略、跨域教學設計、隱喻思考與創作、科技創新、研究與觀點等等。
outline.en: Content may include Systems Science, Design Thinking, Innovation Strategies, Interdisciplinary Instructional Design, Metaphoric Thinking and Creations, Technology Innovation, Research and Perspectives, etc.
